I've played Counter-Strike for 10+ years. I started with Source and the legend continues. This is one of the few E-Sports games that are eternal. I never worry that hours and hours of practice and fun in this game are wasted, because it is never going anywhere. Truly a fun game to play, and a difficult one to master.
